title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Smallholder Farmer Experiential Learning Project: Value Through Participatory Consultation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective methods for utilizing family resources (information, production resources, etc.) while analyzing value chain issues in small-scale farming.
Learners can develop experiential learning models based on collaborative problem-solving experiences with peers through participatory counseling activities.
Learners can present and evaluate sustainable learning strategies reflecting real-world cases of small-scale farming through project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
